text: My Heart is a 2003 classical-crossover album by Norwegian singer Sissel Kyrkjebø released in Norway. In 2004 a new version was released in the US and Japan with several new songs. ==Track listing== ===Norway release=== # Romance # Lascia Che Io Pianga # Mon cœur s'ouvre à ta voix # Wait A While # Tristezze # Hymne # Ich hatte viel Bekümmerniss # Oblivion # Pie Jesu # The Sleeping Princess # Deborah's Theme ===US and Japan release=== # Wait A While # Lascia ch'io pianga # Someone Like You # Tristezza # Angel Rays # Mon cœur s'ouvre à ta voix # Pie Jesu # Oblivion # You Raise Me Up # O Mio Babbino Caro # Ave Maria # Deborah's Theme (from Once Upon A Time In America) == External links == *Review of My Heart by Norwegian newspaper Adressa (04 December 2003) == References == *www.sissel.net *www.discogs.com *www.rockipedia.no Category:Sissel Kyrkjebø albums Category:2003 albums
title: My Heart (Sissel album)
